name: ComboBreaker
description:
This is mostly a proof of concept for the combo mechanic, obviously the game looks... unique?

Currently using a controller with xbox drivers is required.

https://github.com/DarrenHobern/ComboBreaker

CONTROLS:

  • Aim with Left stick, camera with Right stick
  • face buttons + bumpers to enter the combos
  • Hold the left and/or right trigger for the boarder
    • blue = left | red = right | blue/black = both
  • dpad is move and menu control.
